articles.author: Leah Nylen, Josh Sisco
articles.title: DOJ Will Push Google to Sell Chrome to Break Search Monopoly (2) - Bloomberg Law
articles.description: Top Justice Department antitrust officials have decided to ask a judge to force Alphabet Inc.’s Google to sell off its Chrome browser in what would be a historic crackdown on one of the world’s biggest tech companies.
articles.content:

articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: Apple’s headphone adapter for older iPhones sells out, possibly never to return - Ars Technica
articles.description: The end of Lightning is nigh. It’s a bummer for folks with older phones, though.
